item.title: New Jersey Sues Discord for Allegedly Failing to Protect Children
item.description: The New Jersey attorney general claims Discord's features to keep children under 13 safe from sexual predators and harmful content are inadequate.

item.title: 9 Best Indoor Security Cameras (2025): For Homes and Apartments
item.description: Cameras can offer peace of mind, but choose carefully before inviting one into your home.

item.title: 8 Best Dash Appliances (2025), Tested and Reviewed
